author: potuz
content: These are the changes and the branch where I'm working to get EIP-7732 to be executable on the python spec. https://github.com/potuz/consensus-specs/compare/epbs_cl_repo...potuz:consensus-specs:epbs_fix_tests?expand=1

author: potuz
content:
So far they aren't so bad and I started with 714 failing tests, now it's only 
```
======================== 139 failed, 676 passed, 366 skipped, 34 warnings in 144.07s (0:02:24) ========================
```

author: potuz
content: So I think it should not be sooo bad to have a devnet with genesis on 7732 <@504202741933932544>

author: poojaranjan
content:
All the Breakout Room Meeting's can be now found [here](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/tree/master/Breakout-Room-Meetings).

For ePBS, we can point community to the [ePBS Folder](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/tree/master/Breakout-Room-Meetings/(e)PBS) for link to agenda, recording & meeting notes. 

A new [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/1094) is created to update the folder.

author: poojaranjan
content:
FEM is primarily to discuss proposals and research ideas. 

Let's keep the Breakout Room related discussion at the Agenda Issues and not create duplicate threads.

author: poojaranjan
content: We'd appreciate any PR to keep the Breakout room folders up-to-date.

author: abcoathup
content: FEM is primarily to discuss proposals
